thread.title: Nicola Sturgeon tackles online abuse of JK Rowling
thread.title_full: Nicola Sturgeon tackles online abuse of JK Rowling - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Nicola Sturgeon tackles online abuse of JK Rowling
text:
180
Have your say NICOLA Sturgeon has warned supporters of independence not to “hurl abuse” on the internet at opponents after the Harry Potter author JK Rowling was targeted by online trolls.
The First Minister, who has 254,000 followers on Twitter, said “people who disagree are not anti-Scottish”.
Ms Sturgeon spoke out after Scotland’s last-minute defeat to Australia in the quarter-final of the Rugby World Cup, when hostile comments were directed at Rowling after she tweeted her support for the national team.
